articles.description: Chris Eubank Jr suggests he wasn't allowed to shave his beard as he narrowly missed weight for his fight with Conor Benn.
articles.title: Eubank vs Benn: Chris Eubank Jr accuses Benn and team of 'derailing' weight cut

articles.description: Saturday's Copa del Rey final between Barcelona and Real Madrid is about more than just the trophy, writes Guillem Balague.
articles.title: Barcelona vs Real Madrid: Copa del Rey final will define trophies & trajectories

articles.description: The man who will referee Saturday's Copa del Rey final between Real Madrid and Barcelona breaks down in tears as he reveals the pressure Real's TV channel has put officials under this season.
articles.title: Ricardo de Burgos Bengoetxea: El Clasico cup final in tears after Real Madrid TV video

articles.description: As Nottingham Forest, Aston Villa and Man City play in the FA Cup semi-finals this weekend, what's more important - a trophy or a place in the Champions League?
articles.title: FA Cup or Champions League qualification - which means more?

articles.description: Which aspects of their game do England need to get right to beat France and secure a seventh successive Women's Six Nations title on Saturday?
articles.title: Women's Six Nations 2025: England's key battles to secure Grand Slam

articles.description: Paris St-Germain's bid to complete the first ever unbeaten Ligue 1 season ends with four games left as they lose at home to Nice.
articles.title: Paris St-Germain 1-3 Nice: PSG lose first Ligue 1 game of season

articles.description: Liverpool manager Arne Slot says his team have a "big responsibility" to secure the club's 20th top-flight title against Tottenham at Anfield.
articles.title: Liverpool have 'big responsibility' to win title at Anfield - Arne Slot

articles.description: Chelsea forward Cole Palmer's recent struggles on the pitch are "a mental thing", says boss Enzo Maresca.
articles.title: Cole Palmer's goalless run for Chelsea a mental thing - Enzo Maresca

articles.description: Chris Eubank Jr will be fined £375,500 after weighing 0.5lb too heavy for Saturday's grudge match with Conor Benn.
articles.title: Chris Eubank Jr misses weight for Conor Been fight and fined £375,000

articles.description: The jersey worn by basketball legend Kobe Bryant on his Los Angeles Lakers debut sells for £5.26m at auction.
articles.title: Kobe Bryant's Los Angeles Lakers debut jersey sells for £5.26m at auction
